typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		gender as string,
		dep as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> emp
emp pivot(groupBy(dep),
	pivotBy(gender),
	{} = count(id),
	columnNaming: 'Total_$Nabc$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['pivit.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
